node.name: ros_pc_det

node.name: LinkWeaver
node.description: Graph-based relationship analysis platform for compliance and entity resolution. Supports fixed-schema ingestion, full-text search, and interactive graph UI. Built with Dgraph and React.

node.name: sage-os
node.description: Educational 32-bit OS built with C and x86 Assembly. Features custom bootloader, paging, memory management, and syscall handling. Designed for low-level systems exploration.
